website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Gel Nimbus 22 was welcomed by a lot of runners and shoe enthusiasts because of the comfort that it provides. Users experience a soft and responsive ride because this neutral running shoe is packed with technologies that boost the running performance. It is the best option for those who are looking for a durable and responsive running companion.
pros: According to some runners, the Asics Gel Nimbus 22 is supportive
The majority of the buyers agreed that the shoe is comfortable to wear
A user noted that the shoe offers a more structured midfoot and heel design
Many purchasers have appreciated the shoe’s spacious toe box
The Gel Nimbus 22 is durable, based on a couple of reviews
Some reviewers said that this shoe feels softer compared to its previous versions
A few wearers said that the shoe is perfect for long runs
People like the stylish design of this updated shoe
cons: The shoe is heavy, said a consumer
A few reviewers think the Gel Nimbus 22 is expensive

customer_reviews.title: Super soft shock absorbers
customer_reviews.text: Just come back to running after many years off. I used to use nimbus years ago, but as I was just starting out again I got a cheaper pair of trainers as mileage was quite low. Now that mileage is increasing I bought these Nimbus. From the 1st step you can feel the difference, the are so plush and comfortable. You can instantly tell there is less shock to your joints. They are also quite responsive with the new insoles they are putting in them. They won't be your race shoe (if you race) but they aren't designed to be. If you want luxury on training runs they are brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really great running shoes. As suggested below, I’ve bought Size 10.5 instead of 10, as ASICS size running a bit smaller than normal UK size. My husband found them very comfortable and well cushioned from the first day of use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kasia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Have had several ASICS running shoes and was never disappointed. These ones are even lighter than all the previous I owned. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel C.

customer_reviews.title: Well cushioned for neutral runners
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Asics, so I can alternate with successive runs. Predictable fit according to published size. Plenty of toe box space. Good cushioning. May not suit over-pronators. A comfortable run assured for neutral runner. I like these shoes and wouldn’t hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr M.

customer_reviews.title: Only buy Asics - they’re running shoe experts.
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason the majority of amateur runners wear Asics. They fit great and offer decent support and comfort. They last 500-600 miles but every PB for speed and distance I have ever set have been in Gel Nimbus. The 22 are great - unless you have bug problems with pronation you can’t go wrong with these. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ed C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable trainers I have ever worn . Felt like i was walking on springs when I first put on in a good way . These helps with the strain of concrete running , have good grip and help stop feet sweating /help them to breath . These also seem to stop me getting blisters
customer_reviews.author: james evans

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband, he took his first run in these today (18k) and he said they are brilliant, lightweight and lovely to run in. He has ITB and these have helped alleviate a lot of his discomfort. They were also a lot cheaper on here than directly from asics
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Berry

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes. Have used them for about 20 runs now and they have been really comfortable from the first run and feel very well cushioned. They are probably my best pair ever over 30 years of jogging.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Expensive mistake!
customer_reviews.text: The Toe box is smaller than my previous ASICS. Same brand and size as my last 3 pairs of ASICS but these are short on big toe room. Constant pressure on the top end of my big toes. Annoying!
customer_reviews.author: David Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and well made. Has made a significant difference to my running as I find being a big guy the soles cushion my feet well and reduces the impacts on my legs and knees in particular
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great runner,support, comfort. Straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived this morning, so had to try them straight away. Not disappointed. So comfortable, great support and feel. I have bee using Nike for a number of years,but these I feel are much better quality and built for runners. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Andy Whitehurst

customer_reviews.title: Asics never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: Tried a number of brands over the years and ASICS has always been the best. The Nimbus 22 is a superb shoes providing excellent cushioning and support. Really good shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Greenking

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and easy to run in
customer_reviews.text: Great fit even at first try. When running I felt locked in with the heel cup. A little heavier than my Nike reacts but worth the trade for the comfort with the gel surrounding the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Callum

customer_reviews.title: Good item as described
customer_reviews.text: Item as described no issues went up a half size bigger and fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Miss D McCorry

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable  runners
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes . I ordered one size larger than usual having read reviews that said the fit tends to be small - [ normally I take a size 43 but ordered size 44 ] and was glad I did so - they fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Premature survey!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know yet - it’s a Christmas present - it IS that time of year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad promotion by Amazon disappointed me
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are good but Amazon's promotion of them was not. Consequently I felt disappointed
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and support assured.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought ASICS nimbus for years. Although I don’t run a great deal. For me they have the best all round support and cushioning. And the new model builds on the last.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Gait analysis
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn this make for most of my running days (50 years +) and always found them to very good. I would always recommend getting gait analysed before buying running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Cheslett

customer_reviews.title: Will not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: The new ASICS Nimbus 22 will not disappoint Excellent shoe well wort the money
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running shoe, comfortable, cushioned and responsive.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent running shoe, comfortable, cushioned and responsive. Looks great also. I have slightly narrower feet and these fit me perfectly. Perhaps worth noting if you have wider feet you may need to size up.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought my regular size and these fit very well. They feel much better cushioned than my current running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: S TODD

customer_reviews.title: Usual Gel-Nimbus high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. 4th pair of Gel-Nimbus I've had after Nimbus 18, 19 and 20. 35 miles in comfortable and usual good quality so far.
customer_reviews.author: M. Price

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes for long mile runs
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit as expected and they are very comfortable. Did my 5K personal best the first time I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Benson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed, bought a pair in February and my big toe is poking out the top of one after running 400 km. Doesn’t seem up past quality standards. Otherwise a comfy trainer.
customer_reviews.author: JohnC

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my partner, he absolutely loves them! They’re a game changer and helped with knee pain during running. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid upgrade from previous version.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Comfortable. My preferred running shoes for some time now.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W H Bray

customer_reviews.title: Fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes for running. Provide a lot of cushioning and make for a comfortable and padded run over longer distances.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great for running. Shin pain went straight away, would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Matt W.

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT TORN WITH 2 MONTHS OF USE
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT TORN WITH 2 MONTHS OF USE. WHAT CAN I DO? AMAZON? ASICS? WHO WILL HELP ME?
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Top notch running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent comfort, great shock absorbtion and feels secure when running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: size matters.
customer_reviews.text: my shoe size is 8, so take 9 in trainers normally but 9.5 in this product was perfect like they grew there.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Danniel Z's review
customer_reviews.text: My knee no longer complains, one of the best shoes in town and characterised by lasting comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Danniel Zimuto

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent purchase I'm really happy with . Superb fit. Arch support is good. Great for walking
customer_reviews.author: Shahid Qazi

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for walking- haven’t gone for a run yet
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fitted well and made running more comfortable and stable
customer_reviews.author: simon melling

customer_reviews.title: The best nimbus yet
customer_reviews.text: Great long distance road shoe. Very supportive yet reasonably light
customer_reviews.author: Ben m.

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Nimbus 22 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: The Gel-Nimbus 22 delivers the best ride yet with the introduction of adaptive gel, which offers more cushioning as you fatigue. Updated fluid ride creates a more responsive ride in a lighter weight packaging and a 360 fluid skin upper adapts to your foot while strategic overlays seamlessly wrap and support your feet throughout the run. Improved upper fit. Gradient mesh in combination with 3D print will provide an excellent fit combining the right amount of flex and support. A different lasting method will provide more room in the toe-area. Improve fit with new eye-stay design. The star-shaped makes the eye-stay more deformable, which improves static and dynamic fit.
